推.definition: to push; to cut; to refuse; to reject; to decline; to shirk (responsibility); to put off; to delay; to push forward; to nominate; to elect; massage

推三阻四.definition: to use all sorts of excuses

推介.definition: promotion; to promote; to introduce and recommend

推來推去.definition: (idiom) to rudely push and pull others; (idiom) to evade responsibility and push it to others

推出.definition: to push out; to release; to launch; to publish; to recommend

推力.definition: driving force; impetus; thrust (of a boat or airplane engine); repelling force

推助.definition: to bolster; to give a boost to (the economy etc)

推動.definition: to push (e.g. for acceptance of a plan); to promote; to give impetus to

推卸.definition: to avoid (esp. responsibility); to shift (the blame); to pass the buck

推委.definition: variant of 推諉|推诿[tui1 wei3]

推宕.definition: to postpone; to delay; to put sth off

推定.definition: to infer; to consider and come to a judgment; to elect

推尊.definition: to esteem; to revere; to think highly of sb

推崇.definition: to esteem; to think highly of; to accord importance to; to revere

推廣.definition: to extend; to spread; to popularize; generalization; promotion (of a product etc)

推後.definition: to push back (progress, the times etc)

推心.definition: to treat sincerely; to confide in

推心置腹.definition: to give one's bare heart into sb else's keeping (idiom); sb has one's absolute confidence; to trust completely; to confide in sb with entire sincerity

推想.definition: to reckon; to infer; to imagine

推手.definition: promoter; advocate; driving force; pushing hands (two-person training routine esp. in t'ai chi)

推托.definition: to make excuses; to give an excuse (for not doing something)

推拿.definition: tui na (form of Chinese manual therapy)

推挽.definition: to push and pull; to move sth forward by shoving and pulling

推故.definition: to find a pretext for refusing

推文.definition: tweet (on Twitter); (HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile; to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board

推斷.definition: to infer; to deduce; to predict; to extrapolate

推本溯源.definition: to go back to the source

推杯換盞.definition: (idiom) to drink together in a convivial atmosphere

推桿.definition: push rod or tappet (mechanics); putter (golf); to putt (golf)

推波助瀾.definition: to push the wave and add to the billows (idiom); to add momentum; to encourage sth to get bigger; to add fuel to the fire

推測.definition: speculation; to conjecture; to surmise; to speculate

推演.definition: to deduce; to infer; to derive; an implication

推理.definition: reasoning; inference; to infer; to deduce

推甄.definition: to recommend a student for admission to a higher-level school; to put a student on the recommendation track (one of several ways of gaining admission to a higher-level school in Taiwan); abbr. for 推薦甄選|推荐甄选

推移.definition: (of time) to elapse or pass; (of a situation) to develop or evolve

推究.definition: to study; to examine; to probe; to study the underlying principles

推算.definition: to calculate; to reckon; to extrapolate (in calculation)

推而廣之.definition: to apply sth more broadly; by logical extension; and, by extension,

推舉.definition: to nominate as a worthy candidate; to recommend; to elect; to choose; (weightlifting) to (clean and) press

推行.definition: to put into effect; to carry out

推衍.definition: to deduce; to infer; an implication; same as 推演

推說.definition: to plead; to claim as an excuse

推諉.definition: to shirk responsibility; to blame others; to pass the buck

推論.definition: to infer; inference; corollary; reasoned conclusion

推賢讓能.definition: to cede to the virtuous and yield to the talented (idiom)

推車.definition: cart; trolley; to push a cart

推進.definition: to impel; to carry forward; to push on; to advance; to drive forward

推進機.definition: see 推進器|推进器[tui1 jin4 qi4]

推遲.definition: to postpone; to put off; to defer

推重.definition: to esteem; to think highly of; to accord importance to; to revere

推開.definition: to push open (a gate etc); to push away; to reject; to decline

推闡.definition: to elucidate; to study and expound

推陳佈新.definition: to push out the old and bring in the new (idiom); to innovate; to go beyond old ideas; advancing all the time

推陳出新.definition: to push out the old and bring in the new (idiom); to innovate

推陳致新.definition: see 推陳出新|推陈出新[tui1 chen2 chu1 xin1]

推頭.definition: to clip hair; to have a haircut
